replies.body: I think you mixed up Dragon's Fangs and Dragon's Scales
That's nice and all but the golems still have no soup!
If only changes to the game could fix solo queue mentality
Anyone else think that "Dragon Fangs" should give Magic/Armor Pen and "Dragon Scales" should give Armor/MR? I hope that's just a typo...

"Check out these fangs I got! They make me take less damage!"
"Look at these shiny, hard scales. You know what they give me? MORE DAMAGE OUTPUT!"
According to the team i had baron>winning sigh bronze life.

I feel like the new crab jungle camp is weird, and unnecessary... I feel like its going to affect game play way too much around objectives and rewards. But most of all, I'm not sure what direction this is leading. It seems weird to add it, especially with its very unique function.

note: I do have a PBE account so I'm speaking from playing, not speculatiuon
Riot please update the tribunal because it turns the website back to way way earlier version of website.

I think that this will make plays like trading baron for an inhib and nexus tower more risky, with the empowered recall. I also think that backdooring an inhib tower without minions is now impossible for most champions, due to the constant and increasing damage. The buffs to acquiring dragon also make it an interesting objective, and might become more like baron buff.

Overall, good job riot games, and please continue to evolve{{champion:121}} this amazing game.
they fed the dragon potatoes while baron got shat on by teemo

{{champion:161}} like how dragon is more rewarding but finally baron is nerfed 
thx rito
oh man, what do I say? I like the new dragon buff, and the baron buff seems weaker but better if you're behind. I also like that rito copied the lines from the first dragon paragraph to the second.
